Text: 50 Cent is still a thug and a hood rat. He robbed me in NY back in the late 80's. He snatched my gold chain at gun point one day while I waited for the bus at the Jamaica bus terminal in Queens, NY. He is just a rich criminal.

It's just hilarious that some people actualy tag 50cents as an "actor" nowadays... though it's a feat to be a worse actor than he was a musician. No idea about the movie, but I'm sure it's going to be hilarious. Thanks for the upload.
